name: Dark Souls II: Crown of the Ivory King
name_original: Dark Souls II: Crown of the Ivory King
description:
Dark Souls II: Crown of the Ivory King is an action-RPG game developed by FromSoftware. It came out on 30-09-2014. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Dark Souls II: Crown of the Ivory King has a score of 84. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Dark Souls II: Crown of the Ivory King is available on PlayStation 3 and PC.
